creator: Minerva K.K.
descriptionHtml:
【Title】
Reversi : Abstract Strategy Board Game Simple & Stylish

【Overview】
Reversi is a globally popular board game that allows you to enjoy a realistic game with simple rules. In this application, you can enjoy playing against the computer.

【Features and Benefits.】
Simple rules that anyone can enjoy, from beginners to experts.
The computer game can be selected from 3 levels, so even advanced players can enjoy the game.
Simple controls make it easy for anyone to play.
Simple controls, easy for anyone to play.

【Main Functions】
Computer versus computer (selectable from 3 levels)

【How to use】
Start the game and select a play mode.
Select black or white stones.

【Recommended for】
・People who like Othello
・People who like board games
・People who like games that are easy for anyone to play.

What is Reversi / Othello】
Reversi, also known as Othello, is a globally recognized board game in which two players play against each other and the objective is to flip over the stones on the board to their own color. The board consists of 8 x 8 squares, with the stones placed first in the center four squares, and then alternately placed on top of each other. When placing a stone, you can flip that stone over by placing it between your opponent's stones. Ultimately, the player whose stones occupy the most squares on the board wins. Reversi has simple rules and can be quickly enjoyed by beginners.

[About the fun of Othello】
The fun of Othello is one of the reasons why many people have loved the game for so many years. Below are some of the fun aspects of Othello.

1. simple rules
Othello can be played quickly by anyone with its simple rules. It can also be enjoyed quickly by beginners and can be played with family and friends.

2. cultivating the power of thought
Othello requires precise reading of the opponent's stones in order to flip them over. By reading your opponent's moves and thinking about the best move, you can develop your thinking ability.

3. attraction as a board game
Unlike computer games, Othello can actually be played on a board. Also, since you play against your opponent face to face, you can enjoy a realistic sense of tension and interaction.

4. unpredictable development
Othello can create unpredictable developments from the very beginning. Every move is important, and depending on the situation, the once dominant side may lose the game in reverse order, so players can fight without giving up until the very end.

As described above, Othello has a variety of attractions, from simple rules to deep strategies. In particular, by playing against your opponent face to face, you can experience the fun that only a board game can offer.

[Effects of Othello】
Othello requires players to pick up stones with their fingertips and turn them over, which greatly stimulates the fingertips and activates the cerebrum, which controls the ability to manipulate language, thinking, memory, and motor skills. In addition, the process of reading the future development of the game by moving your hands while visualizing the entire board stimulates the right side of your brain, improving your ability to think and remember, as well as cultivating concentration and intuition. Playing Othello is also a great way to train your brain and relieve stress, which can help you lead a healthy life. Furthermore, playing face to face against an opponent can improve communication and social skills. Othello is one of the most popular board games for people of all ages, and along with its fun, it offers many benefits.
descriptionShort: Simple & Stylish Board Game/Abstract Strategy Game.Can your brain beat the CPU?
title: Reversi. Board abstract Game
